note.title: Sample Feature Box Using Lorem Ipsum British-isms
note.para: This is the description of “The Past Meets the Present” FB from the WEG: This would be a point of connection or relevancy piece that would highlight an aspect of chapter content that speaks to an issue in today’s world.

WW-test notes that this feature box has a figure, a table, an index term, a footnote, a link to a figure, and a link to an external URL (visit www.openstax.org). Pezzy little Dalek well fit rumpy pumpy Doctor Who numbskull flip flops, rather complete mare clotted cream pie-eyed fish and chips chinwag scrote, nuthouse houlligan a bottle of plonk sweets flabbergasted. In a pickle tally-ho 'ar kid bull dog ask your mother if owt 'ar kid, get away with ya squirrel it's spitting scones rambunctious, naff the dog's dinner lost the plot middle class punter. Willy bread and butter pudding lost the plot atrocious what a mug bargain Betty squiffy bangers and mash, flabbergasted ee bah gum down South challenge you to a duel the chippy Dalek, as shown in [link]Figure 01_01_Races[/link].

figure.title: Qualitative vs. Quantitative Input in Decision Making

media.alt: An image contrasts qualitative and quantitative factors. A photograph of a large piece of paper with scribbles and numerous sticky notes is labeled “Qualitative = ideas.” A bar graph is labeled “Quantitative data.”

figure.caption: Both qualitative and quantitative factors inform decisions through ideas and numbers. (credit “left”: modification of “Articulamos nuestras ideas” by Cultura de Red/Flickr, CC BY 2.0; attribution “right”: Copyright Rice University, OpenStax, under CC BY 4.0 license)
